hints.content:
We start at $6{:}09$ when Jeremy finishes dinner.


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 5:15 to 6:15 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 5:15, 5:30, 5:45, 6:00, and 6:15 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled tick mark at 6:09. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Jeremy starts eating dinner we go **left** ${44}$ minutes from $6{:}09$.


[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{6{:}09} -{} &\goldE{9}\text{ minutes} = 6{:}00\\\\
{6{:}00} -{} &\purpleD{30}\text{ minutes} = 5{:}30\\\\
5{:}30 -{} & \blueD{5}\text{ minutes} = \greenD{5{:}25} 
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 5:15 to 6:15 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 5:15, 5:30, 5:45, 6:00, and 6:15 are labeled. A series of three arrows are shown moving right to left from the 6:09 tick mark to the 5:25 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 6:09 tick mark and ends at the 6:00 tick mark and is labeled minus 9. The second arrow starts at the 6:00 tick mark and ends at the 5:30 tick mark and is labeled minus 30. The third arrow starts at the 5:30 tick mark and ends at the 5:25 tick mark and is labeled minus 5. !

hints.content:
Jeremy starts dinner at $\greenD{5{:}25} $.  

Which clock shows $\greenD{5{:}25}$?

When Jeremy starts eating dinner, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 5 and 6 and the long hand on the 5. !

question.content:
Jeremy spends $44$ minutes eating dinner with his family.  Jeremy finishes eating dinner at $6{:}09 \text { p.m.}$

**What time did the clock show when Jeremy started eating dinner?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 5 and 6 and the long hand on the last tick mark before the 9.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3f8c822d1deac7f2993a0fbbce9276cb3be79c4f)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 6 and 7 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/95e3da44f07cb560cd7b5731f2a274cbe430a14d)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 5 and 6 and the long hand on the 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a53d5dd5427d422fe1d519c9790dfde691f105fa)
